resources.string: Please read and agree to the terms of the Service Privacy Policy

Press again to exit the Application

We will collect and monitor specific information about your mobile phone,such as device brand and phone model.These information helps us uniquely identify users in order to detect and prevent any unauthorized device from acting on your behalf,which enables us to better detect fraud and manage risk

Camera access is required so that users can easily scan or capture identity files,etc,and save time by allowing us to autornaticassy fill in the date we need,and help improve users\' application procedure and experience
The NBFC loan process and guideline require us to verify reference material.This function enables us to do this ;with this permission ,we can select contacts directly from the contact list

This permission is required so that your can safely download the loan account statement and save it on your phone .You can upload the correct documents for faster loan approval and repayment as well in addition,this permission helps to provuide a very smooth App-using experience users\' application procedure and experience
We will collect and monitor your sms records for credit risk assessment which enables faster loan repayment
In order to speed up your loan application process we need to obtain the following permissions
